title: cultural_data_The_Viking_Ship_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=no.petrusmedia.vikingskipshuset.
Application Name: The Viking Ship Museum.
Number of Reviews: 28.00.
Application Description: The Viking Ship Museum at Bygdøy is one of two buildings belonging to the Museum of Cultural History at the University of Oslo, Norway. At the Viking Ship Museum are finds from the burials from Tune, Gokstad and Oseberg.This audioguide app is presented in multiple languages and have support for ibeacons. The audience is visitors to the museum, but also users who want to experience the content of the app outside the museum.Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 443.00.
Overall Rate: 4.20.
First Page Reviews: Great but audio needs fixing in English version. A good explanation in English but an annoying drumming sound in the background of the audio. I feel this could be easily fixed. It is exslent app gives talk about the vikings ships and more DerekBrasted So kool seen it on youtube now.idk how.the app came up wow hail Did not work. Audio is too low to hear, even with phone volumes at max levels..
